job.title: Senior Infrastructure Engineer
job.description:
Our Purpose
We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.
Job Title
Senior Infrastructure Engineer
Who are We?
SessionM is a customer engagement platform empowering the world’s most innovative brands to forge stronger and more profitable customer relationships. The platform scales for the enterprise, globally. SessionM is headquartered in Boston with offices around the globe.
Who you will work with?
As part of this role, you will work closely with architects, software engineers and operations to design, build, deploy, manage and operate our development, test and production environments. You will build and maintain tools to ensure our applications meet our stringent SLA's in a fast paced culture with a passion to learn and contribute. We are looking for a strong engineer with a can do attitude and a passion to solve problems.
What do you get to do everyday?
Design and Contribute to infrastructure improvements, architecture, development, deployment, and monitor our global distributed platform
Standardize, develop and maintain common development tools and infrastructure, such as CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, cluster management, config management, etc.
Partner with engineering teams to identify and implement infrastructure improvements to better support our customers
Write code and contribute to the software architecture of a highly concurrent, high-throughput system running on AWS
Participate in an environment that emphasizes trust, open communication, creative thinking, and cohesive team effort
Assist with organization wide security considerations
Continue to automate (Infrastructure as code) the deployment of our platform and all the systems it depends on
What kind of person should you be?
Ability to influence others, build relationships, manage conflicts, handle negotiations, and have fun!
Ability to handle pressure and focus on results
Excellent organization, time management, problem-solving, and analytical skills
Self starter who wants to lead initiatives from inception to completion
What skills do you need?
Strong experience working with Linux and AWS or other cloud providers
Strong proficiency in infrastructure as code using Terraform and/or Puppet
Strong ability to code/script using Ruby, Python
Significant experience with automation/configuration management using Puppet
Experience with monitoring tools such as Cloudwatch, SignalFX, Or Nagios
Experience administering databases, such as Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL
Experience with Docker container orchestration using Kubernetes, ECS or EKS
Experience building and maintaining continuous integration/delivery tools in jenkins and/or gitlab
What can you expect from us?
A unique, supportive, and flexible work environment
Challenges related to working in a fast-paced, growing environment
Confidence to take risks when we see potential
A management team that empowers people
Due to COVID-19, most of our employees are working from home. We’ve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely. We value the safety of each member of our community because we know we’re all in this together.
